statements: SELECT * FROM claims_data;
SELECT policy_holder_name, claim_amount FROM claims_data WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT claim_date, claim_amount, policy_holder_name FROM claims_data WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM claims_data ORDER BY claim_id DESC;
SELECT policy_holder_name, claim_date FROM claims_data WHERE policy_holder_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT claim_id, policy_holder_name, claim_amount, claim_date FROM claims_data WHERE claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM claims_data WHERE policy_holder_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT policy_holder_name, claim_amount FROM claims_data WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT claim_id, policy_holder_name, claim_date FROM claims_data ORDER BY claim_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT policy_holder_name, AVG(claim_amount) AS avg_claim_amount FROM claims_data GROUP BY policy_holder_name HAVING AVG(claim_amount) > 2000 ORDER BY avg_claim_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM ClaimsData;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM ClaimsData ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT claimant_name, claimant_address FROM Claimants WHERE claim_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM ClaimsData WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT claimant_name, claimant_address FROM Claimants ORDER BY claimant_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ClaimsData WHERE claim_amount > 10000 ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, policy_number FROM ClaimsData WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY claim_id ASC;
SELECT claim_id, claimant_name, claimant_address FROM Claimants JOIN ClaimsData ON Claimants.claim_id = ClaimsData.claim_id WHERE ClaimsData.policy_number LIKE '%ABC%' ORDER BY claimant_name;
SELECT claim_id, policy_number, incident_date, claim_amount FROM ClaimsData WHERE incident_date < '2022-05-01' AND policy_number IN ('123456', '789012') ORDER BY claim_amount DESC, incident_date ASC;
SELECT claimant_name, claimant_address, COUNT(*) AS total_claims FROM Claimants GROUP BY claimant_name, claimant_address HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_claims DESC;
SELECT * FROM claims_data;
SELECT claim_id, incident_date, policy_number FROM claims_data;
SELECT * FROM policy_holders WHERE first_name='John';
SELECT company_name, company_address FROM insurance_companies;
SELECT claim_id, incident_date, policy_number, claim_amount FROM claims_data ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM claims_data JOIN policy_holders ON claims_data.policy_number = policy_holders.policy_number WHERE claims_data.claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY incident_date DESC;

SELECT claims_data.claim_id, policy_holders.first_name, policy_holders.last_name, claims_data.claim_amount FROM claims_data JOIN policy_holders ON claims_data.policy_number = policy_holders.policy_number WHERE policy_holders.address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY claim_amount ASC;
SELECT policy_number, COUNT(claim_id) AS num_claims FROM claims_data GROUP BY policy_number HAVING num_claims > 3;

SELECT company_name, COUNT(claim_id) AS total_claims FROM insurance_companies JOIN claims_data ON insurance_companies.company_id = claims_data.claim_id GROUP BY company_name ORDER BY total_claims DESC;

SELECT company_email, AVG(claim_amount) AS avg_claim_amount FROM insurance_companies JOIN claims_data ON insurance_companies.company_id = claims_data.claim_id GROUP BY company_email HAVING avg_claim_amount > 2000;
SELECT * FROM Liability_Claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM Liability_Claims WHERE claim_status='Approved';
SELECT insurer_name, insurer_contact FROM Insurers;
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_type FROM Policy_Holders ORDER BY policy_start_date;
SELECT document_id, claim_id, document_type FROM Claim_Documents WHERE document_type='Invoice';
SELECT * FROM Liability_Claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC, claim_amount DESC;
SELECT claim_id, policy_number, claim_amount FROM Liability_Claims WHERE claim_status = 'Approved';

SELECT Policy_Holders.policy_holder_name, Policy_Holders.policy_type, Claim_Documents.document_type FROM Policy_Holders JOIN Liability_Claims ON Policy_Holders.policy_id = Liability_Claims.policy_number JOIN Claim_Documents ON Liability_Claims.claim_id = Claim_Documents.claim_id;

SELECT Insurers.insurer_name, Insurers.insurer_contact, Liability_Claims.claim_status, Claim_Documents.document_path FROM Insurers JOIN Liability_Claims ON Insurers.insurer_id = Liability_Claims.policy_number JOIN Claim_Documents ON Liability_Claims.claim_id = Claim_Documents.claim_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_claims, SUM(claim_amount) AS total_claim_amount FROM Liability_Claims;
SELECT * FROM LiabilityClaims;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_date FROM LiabilityClaims;
SELECT policyholder_name, policy_start_date FROM Policyholders;
SELECT insurer_name, insurer_address FROM Insurers;
SELECT handler_name, handler_department FROM ClaimHandlers;
SELECT * FROM LiabilityClaims WHERE claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;

SELECT Policyholders.policyholder_name, Policyholders.policy_start_date, LiabilityClaims.claim_amount FROM Policyholders INNER JOIN LiabilityClaims ON Policyholders.policy_id = LiabilityClaims.policy_id;

SELECT insurers.insurer_name, insurers.insurer_address, LiabilityClaims.claim_amount FROM insurers INNER JOIN LiabilityClaims ON insurers.insurer_id = LiabilityClaims.policy_id WHERE LiabilityClaims.claim_amount > 10000;
SELECT * FROM IncidentDetails WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY incident_date ASC;

SELECT ClaimHandlers.handler_name, COUNT(IncidentDetails.incident_id) AS total_incidents_handled FROM ClaimHandlers LEFT JOIN IncidentDetails ON ClaimHandlers.handler_id = IncidentDetails.handler_id GROUP BY handler_name ORDER BY total_incidents_handled DESC;
